title: Fragments
medium:
Materials: cotton
Technique: block-printed with resist then immersion dyed for blue. All other colors block printed.                   
Plain weave foundation with three rows of paired bands of red weft at the heading. In the innermost band there are four
inscribed:
A. The following marks are on the front; 
"98 MF & Cie 376" within frame
 "I V K" twice (under a mend)
 "Baffetas" and "F.BLE"
 Decorative side borders of a vine within a frame. 
All the above in black.
 "EN" within a frame three times, twice in red, once in black
 "H.T." in white resist
 On back; "Bleu 98" in black.
dimensions:
A. Warp: 14 cm (5 1/2 in.). Weft: 89 cm (35 in.). Both selvedges present
B. Warp: 84.5 cm (33 1/4 in.). Weft: 43 cm (17 in.). Left selvedge present.
Pattern: Height of repeat: 33 cm (13 in.) Width of repeat: 28 cm (11 in.).
description: Design of curving branches bearing flowers in three reds, grey, yellow and black on a blue background.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragments.
Materials: cotton
Technique: block-printed with resist then immersion dyed for blue. All other colors block printed.                   
Plain weave foundation with three rows of paired bands of red weft at the heading. In the innermost band there are four. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-16-a,b.
